definitions.definition: ( uncountable , countable ) Pliable material derived from the sap of the rubber tree ; a hydrocarbon biopolymer of isoprene .
( uncountable , countable ) Natural rubber or any of various synthetic materials with similar properties as natural rubber.
( countable , Australia , India , Brunei , New Zealand , UK ) An eraser .
( countable , Canada , US , slang ) A condom .
( countable ) Someone or something which rubs .

subdefinitions.definition: A coarse towel for rubbing the body.
An abrasive for rubbing with: a whetstone , file , or emery cloth , etc.

definitions.definition: ( historical ) The cushion of an electric machine .
( countable , baseball ) The rectangular pad on the pitcher's mound from which the pitcher must pitch.
examples: Jones toes the rubber and then fires to the plate.

definitions.definition: ( Canada , US , in the plural ) Water-resistant shoe covers, galoshes , overshoes .
examples: Johnny, don't forget your rubbers today.

definitions.definition: ( uncountable , slang ) Tires , particularly racing tires.
examples: Jones enters the pits to get new rubber .

definitions.definition: ( slang , dated ) A hardship or misfortune .

main_definition: ( uncountable , countable ) Pliable material derived from the sap of the rubber tree ; a hydrocarbon biopolymer of isoprene .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable , countable ) Natural rubber or any of various synthetic materials with similar properties as natural rubber.
( countable , Australia , India , Brunei , New Zealand , UK ) An eraser .
( countable , Canada , US , slang ) A condom .
( countable ) Someone or something which rubs .
( historical ) The cushion of an electric machine .
( countable , baseball ) The rectangular pad on the pitcher's mound from which the pitcher must pitch.
( Canada , US , in the plural ) Water-resistant shoe covers, galoshes , overshoes .
( uncountable , slang ) Tires , particularly racing tires.
( slang , dated ) A hardship or misfortune .

definitions.definition: In relation to a series of games or matches between two competitors where the overall winner of the series is the competitor which wins a majority of the individual games or matches:

subdefinitions.definition: The entire series, of an odd number of games or matches in which ties are impossible (especially a series of three games in bridge or whist ).
An individual match within the series (especially in racquet sports).

definitions.definition: A rubber match ; a game or match played to break a tie .

main_definition: ( sports ) In relation to a series of games or matches between two competitors where the overall winner of the series is the competitor which wins a majority of the individual games or matches:
secondary_definitions: ( sports , Canada , US ) A rubber match ; a game or match played to break a tie .
